text:
Dan Waern, born 17 January 1933 in Sköldinge, Sweden, is a Swedish former middle-distance runner. In 1957, he became the first Swede to run the first sub-four-minute mile. 1957 was also the year he was awarded the Svenska Dagbladet Gold Medal.
In 1961, the IAAF disqualified him for professionalism.
